summary: Toggle the visibility of the quickfix window
name: QFixToggle
description:
QFixToggle allows you to toggle the visibility of the |quickfix| window
easilly.  The goal is to provide easy access to the error list when
programming or searching for text.

Thanks to Hari for the help on the auto-commands.
install_details:
- Unzip the files into your Vim runtime path (vimfiles on Windows, .vim on Unix)
- In Vim, run ':helptags' to rebuild your help file
- Restart Vim
